400.developerMessage: The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax.

401.developerMessage: User authentication token has expired or is missing
401.userMessage: This resource is only available after logging in.

403.developerMessage: User does not have enough privileges to access this resource.
403.userMessage: You do not have access to this resource.

404.developerMessage: The resource could not be found.
404.userMessage: The content you requested was not found.

429.developerMessage: You have sent too many requests in a given amount of time.
429.userMessage: Please wait a while before trying to access this content again

500.developerMessage: There was an error while processing this request. There is probably something wrong with the API server.
500.userMessage: There was an error while processing this request.

599.developerMessage: Connection timeout while processing this request.
599.userMessage: Connection timeout while processing this request.
